name: European Road Haulers Association
membership:
UETR is sectoral member of SMEUnited and takes the lead and chair the SMEUnited Transport Forum.
https://smeunited.eu/en
goal: UETR was founded in 1998 and represents Self employed and Micro, Small and Medium enterprises (road haulers) -  200.000 road transport undertakings in Europe with a total capacity of 430.000 commercial vehicles.
interests: Business and Industry, Climate Action, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Single market, Trans-European Networks, Transport
euInitiatives:
Policies: transport, environment, taxation, internal market.

Legislative files: Mobility Package, Clean Mobility Package, ETS, e-freight
